璑璑璑

璑字的基本解释

璑
wú
三彩玉，是质地较差的玉。

璑字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wú］
［《廣韻》武夫切，平虞，微。］
似玉的美石。

璑字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　璑； 康熙笔画：17； 页码：页741第25
【唐韻】武扶切【集韻】【韻會】微夫切，?音無。【說文】三采玉也。【徐曰】三采，朱蒼白也。【博雅】玉名。【周禮·夏官·弁師諸侯之繅斿九就瑉玉三采註】瑉作璑。璑，惡玉名。【疏】以其三采，又非璠璵，故曰惡玉名。

璑字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
璑字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
wú
Three-color jade is a jade with poor texture.
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wú］
["Guangyun" Wu Fuqie, Pingyu, Wei. ]
Beautiful stone like jade.
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Won Collection 1] [Jade Character Department] 　璑; Kangxi Strokes: 17; Page Number: Page 741-25
[Tang Yun] Wu Fuqie [Jiyun] [Yunhui] Weifuqie, no sound. 【Said the text】San Caiyu also. [Xu Yue] San Cai, Zhu Wanbai also. 【Bo Ya】The name of a jade. 【Zhou Li·Xiaguan·Bian Shi Zhuo’s Reeling Nine Jiu Jiu Jade Three Mining Notes】Zuo Zuozhen. Jing, an evil name. 【Sparse】It is called the evil jade name because of its three collections, and it is not a 璠玙.
